# Changes to PostCSS Attribute Case Insensitive

## 5.0.1 (3 Jun, 2022)

- Prevent exponential backtracking when checking for selectors with case insensitive value matching.

## 5.0.0 (15 Se,p 2020)

- Postcss 8.x support

## 2.0.0 (06 May, 2017)

## 1.0.1 (19 Aug, 2016)
